subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Damion Easley smoked a three-run home run in the ninth inning, as the Mets stomped the Arizona Diamondbacks for their 11th consecutive victory at Chase Field.
snippet: Damion Easley smoked a three-run home run in the ninth inning, as the Mets stomped the Arizona Diamondbacks for their 11th consecutive victory at Chase Field.
